urls.description: Mariya Gabriel, the European Commissioner for Innovation, Research, Culture, Education and Youth EU Commissioner Mariya Gabriel emphasises the incredible advancements made by scientists. In view of Rare Disease Day on 28 February, Horizon has dedicated the Monthly Focus to the developments in rare disease research and innovation in Europe, and beyond. The International Rare Diseases Research Consortium (IRDiRC) has been a major accelerator of diagnostics and treatment. Scientists use advanced computers
